mapper.insert: insert into portfolioT (pf_no, business_num, pf_title, pf_type, pf_subtype, pf_range, pf_zipcode, pf_addr1, pf_addr2, pf_addr3, pf_area, pf_cost, pf_period, pf_concept, pf_introduction, pf_closing, pf_regdate) values (portfolioT_no_seq.nextval, #{business_num}, #{pf_title}, #{pf_title}, #{pf_type}, #{pf_subtype}, #{pf_zipcode}, #{pf_addr1}, #{pf_addr2}, #{pf_addr3}, #{pf_area}, #{pf_cost}, #{pf_period}, #{pf_concept}, #{pf_introduction}, #{pf_closing}, sysdate)
